title: Nintendo is increasing the price of the original Nintendo Switch systems. #nintendo #switch #price

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Nintendo is raising the price of the Switch 1 for the first time since its release back in 2017. All models of the Switch 1, including the OLED and Lite models, will go up in price from around $30-$50. Switch 1 accessories like extra Joy-Con and the Alarmo clock are also going up in price. Select Switch 2 accessories will also see a hike, but the Switch 2 system and games so far are holding steady. In related news, Nintendo's latest financial report shows a promising start to the Switch 2, selling around 6 million units worldwide since launch. Nintendo's goal of 15 million Switch 2's sold by the end of March 2026 looks to be in sight. And if you own a Switch 2, but were hoping for a port of Battlefield 6, you might be waiting a long time. Battlefield boss Vince Zampella has said in an interview that there's currently no plans to release the upcoming shooter on Switch 2.
title: Nintendo Raises Switch 1 Prices For First Time Ever - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description:
Sega's 2D action platforming franchise is making a comeback in the vein of Streets of Rage 4 with Shinobi: Art of Vengeance. You play as protagonist Joe Musashi once again and chase down the villain Lord Ruse after an attack on your village and clan. With fast combos, Ninpo special abilities, and glory kill-style executions, the action of Shinobi is swift and stylish. This is the first 26 minutes of Shinobi: Art of Vengeance, which encompasses the first full level and boss fight.

Shinobi: Art of Vengeance coms out on August 28 for PC via Steam, PlayStation 4 and 5, Xbox One and Series X|S, and Nintendo Switch.
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - The First 26 Minutes of Gameplay

Make use of the all-new Manager Live Challenges, the ability to see team changes over time in the Manager Market, and more. EA Sports FC 26 is launching on September 26 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.

Here’s an exclusive look at all of the coolest stuff from IGN's After Party at San Diego Comic-Con 2025 - Presented by ONE PIECE. The event featured ONE PIECE photo ops, a DJ Booth, Luffy and Tony Tony Chopper mascots, ONE PIECE Promo Card giveaways, and even an appearance by Colleen Clinkenbeard, the English voice of Monkey D. Luffy. ONE PIECE is the iconic episodic series that follows pirate Monkey D. Luffy and his Straw Hat crew on their epic quest to find the “ONE PIECE,” the legendary treasure of Gol D. Roger, former King of the Pirates.

author: IGN
description:
Return to Wakanda. Get another look at Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda in this teaser trailer for this new action-adventure series. Produced in partnership with Proximity Media’s Zinzi Coogler, Sev Ohanian and Kalia King, Eyes of Wakanda follows the adventures of brave Wakandan warriors throughout history. All four episodes of Marvel Animation's Eyes of Wakanda are available for streaming on Disney+ now (August 1, 2025).

In this globe-trotting adventure, the heroes must carry-out dangerous missions to retrieve Vibranium artifacts from the enemies of Wakanda. They are the Hatut Zaraze and this is their story. 

Featuring the voices of Winnie Harlow, Cress Williams, Patricia Belcher, Larry Herron, Adam Gold, Lynn Whitfield, Jacques Colimon, Jona Xiao, Isaac Robinson-Smith, Gary Anthony Williams, Zeke Alton, Steve Toussaint and Anika Noni Rose, “Eyes of Wakanda” is helmed by director/executive producer Todd Harris, a director, producer and storyboard artist who has worked on some of
title: Eyes of Wakanda - Official 'Now Streaming' Teaser Trailer (2025) Winnie Harlow, Cress Williams

description: Become the ultimate bug demolisher in Grounded 2 with our complete guide to mutations! Whether you prefer close-quarters combat or stealthy ranged attacks, mutations let you customize your playstyle and master up to four fighting styles at once. In this video, you’ll learn how to unlock and upgrade mutations, choose and combine fighting styles like Assassin, Smasher, and Whittle Wizard, use survival and exploration mutations to stay alive and adapt, and find armor sets that enhance your mutations and combat abilities.
title: Grounded 2 Mutations Guide: Everything You Need to Know!

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Rust Mobile cinematic reveal trailer for this mobile adaptation of the iconic PC survival game Rust. From open-world exploration and ruthless PvP combat to base building and the tension of trust and betrayal, the mobile version captures the essence of Rust. Pre-registration for Rust Mobile is available now.

Rust Mobile is played from a first-person perspective, with dangers coming from hostile wildlife or rival survivors. Rust Mobile features a fully explorable sandbox world with dynamic day-night cycle, weather systems, and region-based biomes. Core gameplay pillars like scavenging, crafting, building, raiding, and permadeath remain intact, where every decision can mean life or death.

#IGN #RustMobile #Rust
title: Rust Mobile - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description: Take a look at 'The Madden Buzz' Live-Action Launch Trailer for EA Sports Madden NFL 26, the latest addition to the football (American) simulation franchise developed by EA. Players will take to the field with an all-new AI-powered machine learning system trained by real play calls and game situations to deliver new coaching tools, player-specific traits, authentic playstyles, and more. EA Sports Madden NFL 26 is launching on August 14 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch 2, and PC.
title: EA Sports Madden NFL 26 - Official Live-Action Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the 'The World of Battlefield 6' Overview Trailer for Battlefield 6, the latest addition to the online first-person shooter franchise developed by DICE, EA, and Battlefield Studios. 

Players will find themselves at the heart of unprecedented times in the year 2027, where global tensions are at a fever pitch. After the fracturing of Europe and major powers leaving NATO, US forces and it's remaining allies are navigating the chaos as best they can with the cutthroat private military force PAX Armada seeking to take advantage of the power vacuum. Battlefield 6 is launching on October 10.

#IGN #Battlefield6 #BF6
title: Battlefield 6 - Official 'The World of Battlefield 6' Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Battlefield 6 casts its eyes back to the series' best years, mixing what we loved from the likes of Battlefield 3, and Battlefield 4, but is this resurrection of past glories actually exciting? From resurrecting its core class structure of Assault, Support, Engineer, and Recon, to whether or not Battlefield's staple game modes like 64-player Conquest are still just as fun as before, our own Matt Purslow explains why BF6 feels like a safe, yet explosive return to the shooter's past.

#IGN #Battlefield6 #BF6
title: Battlefield 6 Feels Like a Safe, Explosive Return to the Shooter’s Past - Hands-On Preview

author: IGN
description:
Get another look at Yakuza 0 Director’s Cut in this trailer, and see what some critics are saying about the action-adventure game starring Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima. Yakuza 0 Director’s Cut is available now on Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Yakuza0DirectorsCut #Nintendo
title: Yakuza 0 Director’s Cut - Official Accolade Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Eenie Meanie trailer for the upcoming irreverent high-speed thriller film starring Samara Weaving as the titular character Edie, also known as Eenie Meanie. The film also stars Karl Glusman, Jermaine Fowler, Marshawn Lynch, Randall Park, with Steve Zahn and Andy Garcia. 

Eenie Meanie follows a former teenage getaway driver who is dragged back into her unsavory past when a previous employer offers her the chance to save the life of her chronically unreliable ex-boyfriend. 

Eenie Meanie is written and directed by Shawn Simmons. The producers are Rhett Reese & Paul Wernick, and Marty Ewing.

Eenie Meanie will premiere August 22, 2025, exclusively on Hulu in the U.S. and Disney+ internationally.
title: Eenie Meanie - Official Trailer (2025) Samara Weaving, Karl Glusman, Randall Park

author: IGN
description:
"Crossbow" from The Midnight Walkers development team walks you through five minutes of gameplay from Oneway Ticket Studio's upcoming zombie-riddled first-person PvPvE extraction horror shooter. 

Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2795540/The_Midnight_Walkers/

#TheMidnightWalkers #Gaming #IGN
title: The Midnight Walkers: Official Gameplay Explainer

author: IGN
description:
Haikyu!! Fly High! is available now on iOS and Android. Watch the Haikyu!! Fly High! launch trailer to see the characters in action and more from this mobile sports card game based on volleyball anime. Dive into the Haikyu!! universe and assemble your very own Dream Team featuring characters like Shoyo Hinata and Tobio Kageyama. 

In Haikyu!! Fly High!, dominate the court using an electrifying blend of real-time tactics and cinematic 3D action. Relive the story with the original Japanese cast, including Ayumu Murase as Shoyo Hinata and Kaito Ishikawa as Tobio Kageyama. For the global release, the game also introduces an exclusive English-dubbed tutorial voiced by Kiyoko Shimizu's English voice actress.

#IGN #HaikyuuFlyHigh #Haikyuu
title: Haikyu!! Fly High! - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After the full multiplayer reveal of Battlefield 6, we had a chance to sit down with general manager of Battlefield Byron Beede and EVP of Respawn and Battlefield Vince Zampella. In this interview, they discuss how Battlefield 3 and 4 is shaping what to come for Battlefield 6 and what the game is doing to prevent past mistakes with entries such as 2042.

#IGN #Gaming #Battlefield6
title: Battlefield 6 Devs On Developing the "Spiritual Successor" to Battlefield 3 & 4

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection trailer for the fighting game compilation to see the announcement from Digital Eclipse and Atari that physical editions are coming, as revealed during EVO 2025. Physical editions of Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection will include Standard, Deluxe, and Kollector’s Editions. Additionally, Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection will also include the return of Mortal Kombat Trilogy, the 1996 entry that brought every playable character from the 2D Mortal Kombat series into one single game.

Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection will be available on PlayStation 5 (PS5), PlayStation 4 (PS4), Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, PC via Steam, Nintendo Switch 2, and Nintendo Switch in 2025. Physical versions of the game will be available on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, PC, Nintendo Switch 2, and Nintendo Switch.

#MortalKombatLegacyKollection #Gaming #IGN
title: Mortal Kombat: Legacy Kollection - Official Physical Edition Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Welcome back to Next-Gen Console Watch! With Grand Theft Auto 6 now coming sometime in 2026, the gang takes a look at what else is coming this Fall, and it's still a surprisingly deep release window. Sony's Ghost of Yōtei, Activision's Call of Duty: Black Ops 7, Nintendo's Metroid Prime 4: Beyond, and more headline a stacked schedule. Plus we have last week's poll results, and a new poll for you to vote on at IGN.com.

#IGN #Gaming
title: No GTA, No Problem: Fall 2025 Is Secretly Stacked - Next-Gen Console Watch
